class.name: IKRay3D
class.brief_description: A class representing a 3D ray in an Inverse Kinematics system.
class.description: The IKRay3D class represents a 3D ray in an Inverse Kinematics (IK) system. It provides methods to get the heading of the ray, check if the ray intersects a plane, and get a scaled projection of the ray.

method.name: get_heading
method.description: Returns the heading of the ray as a Vector3.

method.name: get_intersects_plane
method.description: Checks if the ray intersects a plane defined by three points (a, b, c). Returns the intersection point as a Vector3, or null if there is no intersection.

method.name: get_scaled_projection
method.description: Returns the scaled projection of the ray onto the input vector.
